long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your handy tool for quick and accurate VAT calculations! Whether you're a business owner, shopper, or simply curious about the VAT on a product, our extension simplifies the process. 

With its intuitive interface, you can effortlessly calculate VAT amounts, inclusive and exclusive prices, and even reverse calculations. 

Say goodbye to manual calculations and get instant results with the VATXpress Calculator Chrome extension. Streamline your financial tasks today!

Multiple language support.
